original_title: Johnny Winter: Legendary Licks Slide Guitar
overview: Watch and learn as this Blues Foundation Hall of Famer demonstrates his signature slide techniques. He plays in the style of Chuck Berry, Muddy Waters and Jimmy Reed, demonstrating Texas shuffle and slow blues. The guitar parts are broken down and taught note for note by master blues teacher Al Eck.
tagline: Watch and learn as this Blues Foundation Hall of Famer demonstrates his signature slide techniques.
title: Johnny Winter: Legendary Licks Slide Guitar
